verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H6680>Command<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to them, <S%H3588>When<s%> you <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan;<s%> <S%H2063>(this<s%> is the <S%H776>land<s%> that shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> to you for an <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> even the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%> with the <S%H1367>coasts<s%> thereof:)

Then your <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H6285>quarter<s%> shall be from the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H6790>Zin<s%> along by the <S%H3027>coast<s%> of <S%H123>Edom,<s%> and your <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H1366>border<s%> shall be the <S%H7097>outmost<s%> <S%H7097>coast<s%> of the <S%H4417>salt<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H6924>eastward:<s%>

And your <S%H1366>border<s%> shall <S%H5437>turn<s%> from the <S%H5045>south<s%> to the <S%H4608>ascent<s%> of <S%H6137>Akrabbim,<s%> and <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> to <S%H6790>Zin:<s%> and the <S%H8444>going<s%> <S%H8444>forth<s%> thereof shall be from the <S%H5045>south<s%> to <S%H6947>Kadeshbarnea,<s%> and shall <S%H3318>go<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> to <S%H2692>Hazaraddar,<s%> and <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> to <S%H6111>Azmon:<s%>

And the <S%H1366>border<s%> shall fetch a <S%H5437>compass<s%> from <S%H6111>Azmon<s%> to the <S%H5158>river<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and the <S%H8444>goings<s%> out of it shall be at the <S%H3220>sea.<s%>

And as for the <S%H3220>western<s%> <S%H1366>border,<s%> you shall even <S%H1961>have<s%> the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%> for a <S%H1366>border:<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> shall be your <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H1366>border.<s%>
And <S%H2088>this<s%> shall be your <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H1366>border:<s%> from the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%> you shall <S%H8376>point<s%> out for you <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H2023>Hor:<s%>

From <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H2023>Hor<s%> you shall <S%H8376>point<s%> out your border to the <S%H935>entrance<s%> of <S%H2574>Hamath;<s%> and the <S%H8444>goings<s%> <S%H8444>forth<s%> of the <S%H1366>border<s%> shall be to <S%H6657>Zedad:<s%>

And the <S%H1366>border<s%> shall <S%H3318>go<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> to <S%H2202>Ziphron,<s%> and the <S%H8444>goings<s%> out of it shall be at <S%H2704>Hazarenan:<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> shall be your <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H1366>border.<s%>
And you shall <S%H184>point<s%> out your <S%H6924>east<s%> <S%H1366>border<s%> from <S%H2704>Hazarenan<s%> to <S%H8221>Shepham:<s%>

And the <S%H1366>coast<s%> shall <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> from <S%H8221>Shepham<s%> to <S%H7247>Riblah,<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H6924>east<s%> <S%H6924>side<s%> of <S%H5871>Ain;<s%> and the <S%H1366>border<s%> shall <S%H3381>descend,<s%> and shall <S%H4229>reach<s%> to the <S%H3802>side<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> of <S%H3672>Chinnereth<s%> <S%H6924>eastward:<s%>

And the <S%H1366>border<s%> shall <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> and the <S%H8444>goings<s%> out of it shall be at the <S%H4417>salt<s%> <S%H3220>sea:<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> shall be your <S%H776>land<s%> with the <S%H1367>coasts<s%> thereof <S%H5439>round<s%> about.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2063>This<s%> is the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you shall <S%H5157>inherit<s%> by <S%H1486>lot,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> to the <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H4294>tribes,<s%> and to the <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H4294>tribe:<s%>

For the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7206>Reuben<s%> according to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers,<s%> and the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> according to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers,<s%> have <S%H3947>received<s%> their inheritance; and <S%H2677>half<s%> the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> have <S%H3947>received<s%> their <S%H5159>inheritance:<s%>

The <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4294>tribes<s%> and the <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H4294>tribe<s%> have <S%H3947>received<s%> their <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> this <S%H5676>side<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> near <S%H3405>Jericho<s%> <S%H6924>eastward,<s%> toward the sun <S%H4217>rise.<s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> shall <S%H5157>divide<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> to you: <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun.<s%>
And you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H5387>prince<s%> of every <S%H4294>tribe,<s%> to <S%H5157>divide<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> by <S%H5157>inheritance.<s%>
And the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H582>men<s%> are <S%H428>these:<s%> Of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3312>Jephunneh.<s%>
And of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon,<s%> <S%H8050>Shemuel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5989>Ammihud.<s%>
Of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> <S%H449>Elidad<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3692>Chislon.<s%>
And the <S%H5387>prince<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan,<s%> <S%H1231>Bukki<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3020>Jogli.<s%>

The <S%H5387>prince<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> for the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> <S%H2592>Hanniel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H641>Ephod.<s%>
And the <S%H5387>prince<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> <S%H7055>Kemuel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8204>Shiphtan.<s%>
And the <S%H5387>prince<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun,<s%> <S%H469>Elizaphan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6535>Parnach.<s%>
And the <S%H5387>prince<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar,<s%> <S%H6409>Paltiel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5821>Azzan.<s%>
And the <S%H5387>prince<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H836>Asher,<s%> <S%H282>Ahihud<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8015>Shelomi.<s%>
And the <S%H5387>prince<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali,<s%> <S%H6300>Pedahel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5989>Ammihud.<s%>

<S%H428>These<s%> are they <S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> to divide the <S%H5157>inheritance<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan.<s%>
